00029 #ifndef _ABSTRACTODESYSTEMFORCOUPLEDPDESYSTEM_HPP_
00030 #define _ABSTRACTODESYSTEMFORCOUPLEDPDESYSTEM_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "AbstractOdeSystem.hpp"
00033 #include "OdeSystemInformation.hpp"
00034 #include "Exception.hpp"
00035 
00047 class AbstractOdeSystemForCoupledPdeSystem : public AbstractOdeSystem
00048 {
00049 protected:
00050     
00054     std::vector<double> mPdeSolution;
00055 
00059     unsigned mPdeSolutionSize;
00060 
00061 public:
00062 
00069     AbstractOdeSystemForCoupledPdeSystem(unsigned numberOfStateVariables = 0,
00070                                          unsigned pdeSolutionSize = 0)
00071         : AbstractOdeSystem(numberOfStateVariables),
00072           mPdeSolutionSize(pdeSolutionSize)
00073     {
00074         mPdeSolution.clear();
00075     }
00076 
00080     std::vector<double>& rGetPdeSolution()
00081     {
00082         return mPdeSolution;
00083     }
00084 
00090     void SetPdeSolution(std::vector<double> pdeSolution)
00091     {
00092         if (pdeSolution.size() != mPdeSolutionSize)
00093         {
00094             EXCEPTION("The supplied vector is not the correct size.");
00095         }
00096         mPdeSolution = pdeSolution;
00097     }
00098 
00102     unsigned GetPdeSolutionSize()
00103     {
00104         return mPdeSolutionSize;
00105     }
00106 };
00107 
00108 #endif //_ABSTRACTODESYSTEMFORCOUPLEDPDESYSTEM_HPP_
